title: Companions Across Time
premise: In the fractured timeline, ALL Fallout companions from every game exist simultaneously. Dogmeat (all versions), Boone, Veronica, Nick Valentine, Paladin Danse, Hancock, Piper, MacCready, Cait, Curie, Deacon, Preston Garvey, and dozens more. They've decided to throw a party. You're invited.
description: The most ridiculous quest in the game. Every beloved companion character from FO1, FO2, FO3, FO:NV, FO4, and FO76 gathering for a wasteland mixer. Expect chaos, romance subplots, philosophical debates, drinking contests, and four different Dogmeats playing together.

stages.name: You're Invited
stages.description: Nick Valentine (FO4 synth detective) and Veronica (FO:NV Brotherhood scribe) have organized a companion reunion. They're inviting every companion who ever traveled with a wasteland hero.
guest_list: Dogmeat x4 (FO1, FO3, FO4, FO76 versions)
MacCready (FO3 Little Lamplight mayor, FO4 merc)

objectives.text: Help set up the party at Lucky 38 penthouse
Gather supplies: 50 Nuka-Cola, 20 bottles whiskey, food
Invite Jax Voss, Harlan Voss, Jaymie, and Denton (your world's NPCs)

stages.name: The Greatest Mixer Ever
stages.description: The party is in full swing. Incredible interactions happen:

events.description: Lone Wanderer's MacCready (FO3, age 10) meets Sole Survivor's MacCready (FO4, age 22). Time is weird. They're both confused.
Four Dogmeats playing poker. They're all good dogs.
Nick Valentine, Curie, and Danse discuss synth rights while Arcade Gannon (anti-Enclave) awkwardly listens.
Hancock, Cass, and Cait have a drinking contest. You can join (END check) or watch them destroy the bar.
Marcus, Fawkes, and Strong debate super mutant identity. Marcus is wise, Fawkes is poetic, Strong just wants human milk.
Boone vs McCready vs any FO76 companions with sniper rifles. You can compete.
Veronica (FO:NV) geeks out with Curie (FO4) about technology while Codsworth serves tea.
Piper interviews everyone for a special edition: 'Companions of the Wasteland - Where Are They Now?'
Jaymie thinks all the companions are 'treasures.' Denton tries to con them. Harlan Voss shares war stories with Boone. Jax Voss glitches between conversations across time.

mini_quests.name: Wing-man for Preston Garvey hitting on Piper
Help Deacon tell outrageous lies to everyone
Get Nick Valentine to dance (impossible, but funny)
Stop Hancock from convincing everyone to try chems

stages.name: Morning After
stages.description: Party's over. Everyone's hungover except the robots. They all exchange contact info and promise to reunite. Some companions offer to join YOU permanently.

outcomes.recruitment: Based on your party behavior, 1-3 companions offer to join your team permanently
outcomes.relationships: New dialogue options unlocked with all companions in wasteland
outcomes.photo: Group photo of all companions becomes a lore item in your inventory
outcomes.legend: News spreads across wasteland about the legendary companion reunion

ending_legendary_party.name: The Night to Remember
ending_legendary_party.description: Best party in wasteland history. All companions remember you fondly. Unlocks unique companion recruitment options.
ending_legendary_party.reward: Can recruit companions from ANY Fallout game

ending_disaster.name: The Night to Forget
ending_disaster.description: Party went horribly wrong. Bar destroyed. Companions swear to never meet again. But at least it was memorable.
ending_disaster.reward: Unique 'Party Disaster' achievement and hilarious lore item

meta_commentary: This quest exists purely because timelines are fractured. It celebrates EVERY Fallout game's companions in one absurd, joyful gathering. Canon doesn't matter. Fun does.

unique_items: Group Photo of All Companions (lore item)

special_note: This quest is pure fan service and we're not apologizing. Enjoy the chaos.
